Package edu.odu.cs.cs350

Class JSONReportWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.odu.cs.cs350.ReportWriter
      • edu.odu.cs.cs350.JSONReportWriter
  • public class JSONReportWriter
extends ReportWriter
    The JSONReportWriter class extends the ReportWriter class and overrides its method to write reports in JSON format. It uses the JsonWriter library to convert data into a JSON string and writes it to a file.
